Question: This person had earlier asked Lovecraft to write an article about astrology, for which he paid $75.
Hints: This person persuaded groups in Buffalo, Detroit, Pittsburgh, and Kansas City to join.
This person was buried, without a casket, in a pit of earth six feet deep.
The stunt was to be the feature escape of his 1927 season, but this person died on October 31, 1926.
